sense.def: Abbreviated Designation ru lie 乳裂 ; Alternative Names ru tou lie po 乳頭裂 破 , cracked open breast nipples; ru tou po lie 乳頭破裂 ; nai tou hua 奶頭花 , breast nipple blossoms; nai tou hua lie 奶頭花裂， breast nipples blossoms cracked open. Pathological Condition with the female breast nipples cracking and being painful during the period of breast-feeding. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 71: 治婦人乳頭裂，痛，欲成瘡方 , “Recipe to cure women with cracked breast nipples that are painful and may develop into sores”.
